newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle light at $68.00 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle light at $68.00 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was at a near standstill in the Panhandle area Tuesday, USDA said.

Slaughter steers and heifers were not well tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers with bids remaining mostly at $66.00 per cwt. Last established market was a light test Friday at $68.00 and feedlots continue to ask $68.00 or more.
Sales reported on 200 slaughter heifers; 22,000 confirmed for the week to date including 21,100 formulated cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Heifers - Pen Select and Choice 2-3 1100 lbs North Plains 68.00.
Confirmed - 200 Week ago - None Year ago - 10,700
Wk to date - 22,000 Week ago - 22,900 Year ago - 28,000
